content.rendered:
Photo via Unsplash

This Week in Genesis, a new plugin from Sridhar Katakam, StudioPress is offering one month free (and free migrations) on StudioPress Sites, and your latest projects in the showcase.

Showcase

Pilcrow Pixel always do some of the finest designs in Genesis and their latest is no exception, scudd.org.uk

Recently launched a new site for SCUDD, the Standing Conference of University Drama Departments: https://t.co/IQSqYJUFMk #genesiswp

— Pilcrow + Pixel (@PilcrowPixel) April 20, 2017

Nice use of the Aspire Pro theme by christinecapone.com

Wow! Check out what @CaponeCreative did with the 'Aspire Pro' Theme! https://t.co/O4BP2H3z4R #genesiswp #wordpress pic.twitter.com/ChezEtXUN8

— Wes Straham (@WesStraham) April 17, 2017

Dom Wint re-purposes the Cafe Pro theme for studio32saddleworth.co.uk

#genesiswp Café Pro theme repurposed for a personal trainer: https://t.co/j0dmlrgrlK #wordpress pic.twitter.com/MsOhBOrxRP

— Dom Wint (@CleanPageDesign) April 20, 2017

Jesse Petersen re-vamps GenesisThe.me.

We have a new look at https://t.co/rqiiGNJFSV today! Not bad for 3 hours not feeling well. Time for a nap.

— Jesse Ⓦ Petersen (@jpetersen) April 22, 2017

Best of the rest

Sridhar Katakam creates a Genesis Sidebar Content Sidebar Sidebar Layout plugin (yes, that’s three sidebars).

Plugin for additional Primary Sidebar | Content | Secondary Sidebar | Tertiary Sidebar Layout in #GenesisWP:https://t.co/7z8bVyryyr

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 16, 2017

Plus, he’s added a few new (member only) tutorials to his site, including adding a gradients animation in Genesis using Granim.js

Gradients animation in Genesis using Granim.js:https://t.co/UP0ctN8rG7

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 20, 2017

And how to add a fixed background footer in Genesis.

Fixed Background Footer in Genesis:https://t.co/Cl7zsTkcpDhttps://t.co/w54p3qKGmV

— Sridhar Katakam (@srikat) April 18, 2017

StudioPress is offering one month free plus a free migration to its StuidioPress Sites platform.

StudioPress Sites: First Month Free, plus a No Charge Migration — https://t.co/Rv0YTRIeKz #genesiswp pic.twitter.com/zV7HfcGavr

— StudioPress (@studiopress) April 20, 2017

UK Genesis is planning another meet up.

Organising another UK Genesis meet up not tied to a WordCamp. Have your say on day, month & location here https://t.co/qIWTkCPLhK #genesiswp

— UK Genesis (@UKGenesis) April 20, 2017

While Sergio Sala just held one in Medellin, Colombia.

Voy a dar una plática este jueves sobre #genesiswp en Medellin, quién se anima? 😁 https://t.co/Llt3FRdyWJ pic.twitter.com/elG7m27ZKN

— 👨🏽‍💻 sergiosala (@sergiosa_la) April 18, 2017

Fue emocionante mostrarle a todos estos chicos sobre las bondades de #genesiswp 👌🏽😁 pic.twitter.com/DSGxrYjUTm

— 👨🏽‍💻 sergiosala (@sergiosa_la) April 21, 2017

And finally…

I couldn’t have said it better myself.

There is no end to the love I have for #GenesisWP. Makes development fun again.

— Kyrie Tompkins (@kyrietompkins) April 17, 2017
